channel.title: Software on Slices of a hacker's mind

item.title: Habit Score
item.description: For long, I’ve used the Habit Tracker[0] to keep track of my daily routines.

item.title: mdBook
item.description: In the last days my main occupation was writing. Once a bit time was at hand I focused on getting something written, by hand or by the computer.

item.title: 30.05.2020 - link drop
item.description: Warning: This artical provide just very little useful information and promotes products I do not support.

item.title: 14.05.2020 - link drop
item.description: Optimizing video quality using Simulcast (Oscar Divorra) - webrtcHacks

item.title: A missing Symbol
item.description: Lately, I’m trying to move away from X to Wayland. I use KDE for this and it seems to be almost possible.

item.title: What I Have Learned Today
item.description: Today, I have learned that the ‘Carbon’ Daemon of graphite is not able to handle encryption for incoming data.
